title: Painkiller Jane: The Price of Freedom #1
description: Cover by Amanda Conner (W) Jimmy Palmiotti (A) Sam Lofti, Juan Santacruz JANE is back in action as we follow her on an adrenaline filled adventure protecting a Saudi Arabian princess on her visit to the New York City. It seems a number of people want her dead and the only thing between them and her royal highness is our gun toting, out of control, Painkiller Jane. Also in this issue a 10 page back up telling you all about the origin of Painkiller Jane and her friendship between her best friend Detective Maureen Fernandez.
author: Jimmy Palmiotti
